title: Tour of Poland stage 2: Matej Mohorič outsprints João Almeida for hilltop victory, leader’s jersey
content:
Follow all the action as Thomas, McNulty, Almeida headline star cast for seven-day WorldTour race.

Read the full article at Tour of Poland stage 2: Matej Mohorič outsprints João Almeida for hilltop victory, leader’s jersey on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
